title: Dhaka-Bandarban-Rangamati-Dhaka(AC Bus)
description: Royal organizations, parliament, and the royal court determined the appearance of Westminster for all: now it is still officiously-Royal district, where a lot of the royal property and – in comparison with other areas – little houses. But there are so many attractions.

title: Dhaka – Saint Martins Island – Dhaka (Non AC)
description: St. Martin's Island is a small island in the northeastern part of the Bay of Bengal, about 9 km south of the tip of the Cox's Bazar-Teknaf peninsula, and forming the southernmost part of Bangladesh. There is a small adjoining island that is separated at high tide, called Chera Dwip.

title: Thailand + Malaysia Special Package
description: Malaysia is a Southeast Asian country occupying parts of the Malay Peninsula and the island of Borneo. It's known for its beaches, rainforests and mix of Malay, Chinese, Indian and European cultural influences. The capital, Kuala Lumpur, is home to colonial buildings, busy shopping districts such as Bukit Bintang and skyscrapers such as the iconic, 451m-tall Petronas Twin Towers

title: Dhaka - Chittagong - Cox'sbazar -Dhaka
description: Cox’s Bazar is a town on the southeast coast of Bangladesh. It’s known for its very long, sandy beachfront, stretching from Sea Beach in the north to Kolatoli Beach in the south. Aggameda Khyang monastery is home to bronze statues and centuries-old Buddhist manuscripts. South of town, the tropical rainforest of Himchari National Park has waterfalls and many birds. North, sea turtles breed on nearby Sonadia Island.

title: Dhaka – Srimongal – Sylhet – Dhaka Tour Package
description: Sreemangal is an upazila of Moulvibazar District in the Sylhet Division of Bangladesh. It is located at the southwest of the district, and borders the Habiganj District to the west and the Indian state of Tripura to the south.

title: Kuakata Package
description: Kuakata is a town in southern Bangladesh known for its panoramic sea beach. Kuakata beach is a sandy expanse 18 kilometres long and 3 kilometres wide. From the beach one can have an unobstructed view of both sunrise and sunset over the Bay of Bengal.

title: Bali Kuala Lumpur And Genting Highland Tour Package From Dhaka
description: Denpasar, a bustling city, full of beautiful temples, museums, parks, and many more attractions, is one of the most sought-after tourist stop-overs in Indonesia. It showcases a perfect blend of conventional Balinese culture, art, and modernized attractions. The Palace of Satria and Royal Temples, Pura Maospahit, Pura Agung Jagatnata are some of the famous ancient temples that let the visitors enjoy spirituality in the divine environment. Whereas, Alun-Alun Puputan, Lapangan Puputan Margarana, Taman Wedhi Budaya Cultural Centre, Sidik Jari Museum, Bali Museum are other prominent attractions, which surely deserves a visit and explain about the history and culture of the city. Besides, Turtle Conservation and Education and Shark Island are for wildlife lovers while stunning beaches entice the visitors for their scenic beauty and tranquillity. You can also take part in various adventurous activities on any of the beautiful beaches or enjoy relaxing spa therapies there.
